name: Donald Kenneth SHAFFER, Petitioner, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Shaffer v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Donald Kenneth SHAFFER, Petitioner, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of March, 2003, probable jurisdiction is noted and the April 4, 2002 Commonwealth Court order is affirmed
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
819 A.2d 534
Donald Kenneth SHAFFER, Petitioner, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 21, 2003.
